localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.
blogPost.body: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.
blogPost.title: Pyro - Spotify music voting for parties
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 举办派对？让你的客人实时选择音乐与Pyro! 连接您的 Spotify 帐户，创建一个派对，用链接邀请您的客人，然后您就可以开始了。协作聆听从未如此简单。
舉辦派對？讓你的客人實時選擇音樂與Pyro! 連接您的 Spotify 帳戶，創建一個派對，用鏈接邀請您的客人，然後您就可以開始了。協作聆聽從未如此簡單。

previous.excerpt: Our new Slack App: Bring Process Street into Slack to manage and automate all your workflows in one place. Handle tasks, forms and approvals in a few taps, without needing to leave Slack. Process Street makes your team's recurring work fun, fast and faultless.
previous.title: Process Street’s Slack App - Manage and automate your recurring work in a single place

localize.description: 我们的新 Slack App。将Process Street引入Slack，在一个地方管理和自动化您的所有工作流程。只需轻点几下即可处理任务、表格和审批，无需离开Slack。流程街让您团队的经常性工作变得有趣、快速和无懈可击。
localize.tagline: 在一个地方管理和自动化您的重复性工作。

localize.description: 我們的新 Slack App。將Process Street引入Slack，在一個地方管理和自動化您的所有工作流程。只需輕點幾下即可處理任務、表格和審批，無需離開Slack。流程街讓您團隊的經常性工作變得有趣、快速和無懈可擊。
localize.tagline: 在一個地方管理和自動化您的重複性工作。

next.excerpt: Install Netflip on your partner's device to find movies you BOTH like. Swipe right to LIKE! If your partner likes the same movie you HAVE to watch your match. Select your streaming services to make sure you can watch your matched movie or TV show.
next.title: Netflip - Tinder for movies: swipe through Netflix, Prime or Disney+

localize.description: 在您的伴侣的设备上安装Netflip，以找到你们双方都喜欢的电影。向右滑动就可以 "喜欢 "了！如果你的伴侣喜欢同一部电影，你就必须看你的匹配电影。如果你的伴侣喜欢同样的电影，你就必须观看你的匹配。选择您的流媒体服务，以确保您可以观看匹配的电影或电视节目。
localize.tagline: 火柴人看电影：扫一扫Netflix、Prime或Disney+。

localize.description: 在您的伴侶的設備上安裝Netflip，以找到你們雙方都喜歡的電影。向右滑動就可以 "喜歡 "了！如果你的伴侶喜歡同一部電影，你就必須看你的匹配電影。如果你的伴侶喜歡同樣的電影，你就必須觀看你的匹配。選擇您的流媒體服務，以確保您可以觀看匹配的電影或電視節目。
localize.tagline: 火柴人看電影：掃一掃Netflix、Prime或Disney+。
